original_text: On the contrary, when they saw that I had been entrusted with the gospel to the uncircumcised, just as Peter had been entrusted with the gospel to the circumcised
korean_text: 도리어 그들은 내가 무할례자에게 복음 전함을 맡은 것이 베드로가 할례자에게 맡음과 같은 것을 보았고

sentences.original_text: when they saw that I had been entrusted with the gospel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내가 복음을 맡겨받았다는 것을 보았을 때에

sentences.original_text: just as Peter had been entrusted with the gospel
